name: 33 Highland 1C | Flexible Housing | Pvt. BR & BA
description:
If you are looking for flexibility, ease and affordability with all the uncertainty of COVID this Fall and Winter then look no further.

Thatch's Co-Living and furnished monthly rentals are tailor-made for this. Why commit to a 1 year lease, pay to move, pay a broker, buy furniture and spend precious time moving and getting settled if you aren't sure whether you'll be here for a year or not?

With Thatch you pick the perfect place and commit only to the dates you need. Let us do the rest!

The space
This is a brand new building, designed for Co-Living. All amenities, as well as utilities are included in monthly rent.

Each bedroom has a private, en-suite bathroom

In total there are five bedrooms (each with a private lock), along with a shared kitchen and living room, all of which are fully outfitted and furnished.

Washer and Dryer are in unit.
